conductingBody: Gujarat Secondary and Higher Secondary Education Board (GSEB)
eligibility: Candidates must be Indian residents of Gujarat, have passed or be appearing in Class 12 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics/Biology, and must have scored at least 45% marks (40% for reserved categories) in the qualifying exam[1][2].

faqs.question: How can I apply for GUJCET?
faqs.answer: Candidates can apply for GUJCET online through the official website gujcet.gseb.org by filling out the application form, uploading required documents, and paying the application fee. Eligibility includes being a resident of Gujarat, passing or appearing in Class 12 with required subjects, and meeting the minimum marks criteria[1].
